mapper.select: SELECT seatview_id as seatviewId, user_id as userId, seat_date as date, detail, seat_rank as seatRank, seat_id as seatId FROM tb_seatreview ORDER BY seat_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_seatreview (user_id, detail, seat_rank, seat_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{detail}, #{seatRank}, #{seatId})
